alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; Grant; West Becker; West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 13 at 7:12PM CST until January 15 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST MONDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...West Becker, Wilkin, West Otter Tail, East Otter Tail and Grant Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST Monday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while outside. Wear appropriate winter clothing. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Otter Tail; Grant; West Becker; West Otter Tail; Wilkin
